languages.text: This creature provokes the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> against the creature's allies but not against the creature themselves.

languages.text: 此生物激怒目标，使目标对此生物所有盟友造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，但伤害减免效果对此生物本身不起作用。
languages.original_text: This creature provokes the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> against the creature's allies but not against the creature themselves.

traits.locale_text: 此生物激怒目标，使目标对此生物所有盟友造成的伤害降低，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，但伤害减免效果对此生物本身不起作用。

languages.text: Существо провоцирует цель и на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g}</u> сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, который цель наносит союзникам существа (но не ему самому).
languages.original_text: This creature provokes the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> against the creature's allies but not against the creature themselves.

traits.locale_text: Существо провоцирует цель и на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g}</u> сокращает урон, который цель наносит союзникам существа (но не ему самому).
Существо провоцирует цель и на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g}</u> сокращает урон, который цель наносит союзникам существа (но не ему самому).

languages.text: この生物はターゲットを挑発し、その生物の味方に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を−<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分減少させるが、その生物自身に対しては減少しない
languages.original_text: This creature provokes the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> against the creature's allies but not against the creature themselves.

traits.locale_text: この生物はターゲットを挑発し、その生物の味方に対するダメージを−<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分減少させるが、その生物自身に対しては減少しない。

languages.text: Esta criatura provoca al objetivo, reduciendo su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} </u> contra los aliados de esta criatura, pero no contra la propia criatura.
languages.original_text: This creature provokes the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> against the creature's allies but not against the creature themselves.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura provoca al objetivo, reduciendo su daño en −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} </u> contra los aliados de esta criatura, pero no contra la propia criatura.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur provoziert das Ziel und verringert dabei dessen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> gegen Verbündete der Kreatur, jedoch nicht gegen die Kreatur selbst.
languages.original_text: This creature provokes the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> against the creature's allies but not against the creature themselves.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur provoziert das Ziel und verringert dabei dessen Schaden um -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> gegen Verbündete der Kreatur, jedoch nicht gegen die Kreatur selbst.

languages.text: Cette créature provoque la cible, ce qui réduit de −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g}</u> les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux alliés de cette créature, mais pas à elle-même.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature provoque la cible, ce qui réduit de -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g}</u> les dégâts infligés aux alliés de cette créature mais pas à elle-même.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, hedefi kışkırtarak onun yaratığın dost birimlerine (ama yaratığın kendisine değil) vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> kadar azaltır.
